server.controllers

Class ThreadRemoveOrderWaiting

  • java.lang.Object
    • server.controllers.ThreadRemoveOrderWaiting

  • public class ThreadRemoveOrderWaiting
extends java.lang.Object
    This Class is for removing orders from waiting list in case the time has passed The Class contians methods for starting the thread , setting connection to the db and the main method of the deleting orders from waiting list
    Author:
    Omer
